title: Pool Party Miss Fortune: Legendary Pool Party Skin
body:
So I found some fan artwork of Pool Party Miss Fortune that's REALLY similar to what I had in mind...

https://65.media.tumblr.com/2455c5024207c10f05a0d691d48bfeb4/tumblr_o93olb3Ydf1vuu3clo1_1280.png

Other than the summer outfit (which would be replaced by a bikini of the same blue color), this had all of the other appearance ideas I had in mind.

Bikini would be a modest bottom, tied at both sides just above the hips. Top would be two modest triangles, leading up to being tied around the neck with a band all the way around her rib cage.

Particle/sfx changes would be as follows:

- Globs of Water for Auto attacks
- Love Tap would become two water drops, angled to look like an upside-down heart. Splash SFX
- Make it Rain would be water drops with a puddle on the ground, with a shower SFX
- Double Up Failure would sound like a low splash or spill
- Strut would use suns instead of hearts
- Bullet Time would use tidal waves, with similar SFX
- Strut Active would make the water tanks glow blue instead of Green.

PLEASE! This would be a perfect Pool Party skin with a curvaceous humanoid female in a bikini to go along with Lifeguard Sivir!
